author: Dee Dee
text: If nothing else be COMPASSIONATE. The world NEEDS MORE compassionate people.

author: Dee Dee
text: I’m attending Los Angeles Unified School District’s event, “LAUSD Webinar: Changes to the 2021 Child Tax Credit (CTC) and  Advance Payments of the CTC for 2021” – sign up now to join me!  https://t.co/n0NUWCct7w
